item.title: Development Update #75
item.description: The coin is done. We are working on networking. There are three different groups working independently on that and its not on github yet. The coin needs: Database for storing blocks Database for history gui improvements Misc improvements (the blockchain does not save on windows when closing) We have to move on to next part to keep schedule. Then new people can work on coin improvements. The improvements are marginal at this stage and could take up almost all the project resources if we only focused on that at this stage.
